sentence.Network_en: The main beneficiaries of pension equality so far have been men.

sentence.Network_en: All our activities are premised on the basis of "Quality with Equality".

sentence.Network_en: The Commission for Racial Equality teaches organisations not to discriminate.
sentence.Network_cn: 种族平等委员会告诫各家机构不要心存歧视。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin aequalitas, from aequalis (see equal)

entry.tran: （地位、权利、责任等的）均等，平等
entry.def: Equality is the same status, rights, and responsibilities for all the members of a society, group, or family.

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being the same in quantity or measure or value or status
2. a state of being essentially equal or equivalent; equally balanced;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,表示"某种性质,状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: absurd荒谬的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.荒谬

stems_affixes.value_cn: 权威,威信,权威人士,权力
stems_affixes.word_buile: author创造者+ity某种性质,状态等→n.权威,威信,权威人士,权力
electric电的+ity某种性质,状态等→电,电流

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性
stems_affixes.word_buile: equal相等的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性

stems_affixes.value_cn: 熟悉,通晓,亲密,熟悉,精通
stems_affixes.word_buile: familiar熟悉的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.熟悉,通晓,亲密,熟悉,精通
frugal节约的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.节约,节俭
genial亲切的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.和蔼,温和
infirm弱的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.虚弱
mendac说谎+ity某种性质,状态等→n.虚假
opportune凑巧的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.机会,时机
prob测试,证明+ity某种性质,状态等→[人]经得起证明和试验
rigid刚硬的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.固执,坚定,僵化
san健康的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.神志清楚
simpl=simple简单的+ic+ity某种性质,状态等→n.简单,简易,朴素,直率
venal贪财的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.唯利是图
ad加强+equ相等,平均+ate……的→和所需的趋向相等

stems_affixes.value_cn: 稳定的,不变的,[脾气]温和的
stems_affixes.word_buile: equ相等,平均+able……的→[心情]能稳定的
equ相等,平均+al……的→adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于
ad加强+equ相等,平均+acy状态→[数量]已经加到相等了→够了
equ相等,平均+al……的→adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性
stems_affixes.word_buile: equal[adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于]+ity表名词→n.同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性
equate[v.同等看待,使相等]+ion表名词→n.[数学]等式,方程式;[with]相等;均衡
equ相等,平均+ity表名词→n.公平,公正
equ平等+anim生命+ity表名词→生命平等→平静
equ相等,平均+al……的→adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于
equ相等,平均+ate表动词→v.同等看待,使相等

How can it be that societies like Sweden,where gender equality is vigorously pursued and enforced,have fewer female managers,executives,professionals,and business owners than eh laissez-faire(自由放任的)united states
